name: The Iris Navis
description:
The Iris Navis is a prototype game made by two friends. Currently for Android only.

The player controls a space ship with a colour changing shield that can destroy ships of the same colour.

Fly endlessly through waves of RGB enemies. 

--Controlls--

Placing the finger on the screen will move the player ship around and cause its shield to change in colour.

Releasing the finger will make the player ship shoot.

Shoot enemies to gain score and collect pickups. 

Collect 3 individual colours to gain a point. When enough points are collected the player can choose an upgrade.

-----------------

The game is currently just a prototype made in 1 day. Multicolouredcube Studios intends on further developing it.
